section.heading: Fees.
section.text: The fees established by the Board are as follows:

para.text: Address change, failure to notify the Board — $50;
Application for initial licensure (includes first temporary license and is nonrefundable) — $200;
Continuing Competency Provider Contact Hour review — $30;
Reactivation of license after elective nonrenewal — $245;
Renewal, late fee (applicable to renewal made after the renewal deadline) — $100;
Interstate occupational therapy licensure compact fee — $125.

section.heading: Assessment for Health Care Professionals.
section.text: At the time of license renewal an occupational therapist shall pay a fee for health care professionals assessed by the Maryland Health Care Commission (MHCC), as specified in COMAR 10.25.02.

annotations.annotation: Health Occupations Article, §§10-205 and 10-206, Annotated Code of Maryland
